activities.name: Mister Oso
activities.description: Delicious South and Central American inspired food and cocktails. Be sure to reserve a table ahead of time!

activities.name: Fish N Beer
activities.description: Just as advertised, they've got fish, and they've got beer. The dishes are better than seafood in a landlocked state has any right to be, highly recommend.

activities.name: US Thai Caf√©
activities.description: A Thai food restaurant located in the vicinity of Sloan's Lake park. The restaurant is small and fills up quickly, and the phone line frequently gets overloaded with carry out orders, so it is best to place your order early! If you order your food spicy,the staff will often ask if you have previously tried *their* 'spicy' to ensure you are not surprised by the lava hot spice levels. Friends who have lived in Thailand describe the spice level as 'authentic.'

activities.name: Golden Moon Distillery
activities.description: A distillery located in beautiful Golden, Colorado. The distillery was founded with the goal of producing high quality artisanal whiskies, brandies, liquors, and liqueurs drawing from founder Stephen Gould's personal library of rare books detailing recipes and techniques going back to the 1500s.

activities.name: Breckenridge Brewing
activities.description: Located in the historic mountain town of Breckenridge Colorado, this brewery offers a variety of beer styles and a full menu of food, perfect after a day of skiing. There is a second location in Littleton, Colorado.

activities.name: The 1 Up Arcade and Bar
activities.description: An arcade and bar featuring classic arcade games, pinball machines, and skeeball. It's strictly 21+.

activities.name: Puttshack
activities.description: tech-infused mini golf with a restaurant and bar!

activities.name: Comedy Works
activities.description: Stand-up bastion presents famed comedians along with up-and-comers in an intimate basement space.

activities.name: Trading Post Trail at Red Rocks
activities.description: A moderately difficult hiking trail in Morrison, Colorado. This trail is fun because if there is a concert in Red Rocks Amphitheater you can enjoy a soundtrack to your hike.

activities.name: Chautauqua Park
activities.description: A popular park in Boulder with moderately difficult hiking trail.

activities.name: South Mesa Trail
activities.description: Located on the southern side of Boulder, this hike offers a range of difficulty levels to accomodate varying skill levels. There is parking available, but it fills up quickly on weekends so it's best to arrive early. You are welcome to bring dogs as long as you keep the dog on a leash.

activities.name: Meow Wolf
activities.description: A fun and weird psychadelic immersive art experience. The original installation started in Santa Fe in 2008, it has since expanded to locations in Texas and Denver. You can walk through and enjoy it passively,or you can immerse yourself in solving a strange mystery.

activities.name: Denver Botanic Gardens
activities.description: Lush gardens flourishing with exotic, rare, and native plants. Offers year-round events, and is a popular venue for weddings and other special occasions. The Japanese garden section is particularly beautiful, featuring native Colorado plants in a classic Japanese style.

activities.name: Casa Bonita
activities.description: Casa Bonita is a Denver institution. Known for its cliff divers, sopapillas, roaming mariachi bands and Black Bart's hideout, the Lakewood restaurant has provided memories for thousands of Coloradans since it first opened in 1974. The new owners of the restaurant put forty million dollars into upgrading the space and hiring a professional chef to overhaul the menu.
